title: User Authentication with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully authenticate using valid email and password with optional 2FA.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid email and correct password.
If 2FA is enabled, input the valid 2FA code.
Submit the login form.
Verify that the user is logged in and redirected to their role-based dashboard.

title: User Authentication with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with an incorrect password or email.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an invalid or unregistered email and/or incorrect password.
Submit the login form.
Verify that the system displays an appropriate error message and login is denied.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users can access only the modules and functions allowed by their assigned roles.

steps.description: Login as a user with a restricted role (e.g., VOL or VIEWER).
Attempt to navigate to an admin-only module or perform a privileged action.
Verify that access is denied with HTTP 403 error or UI restriction.
Login as SYSADMIN.
Access all modules and perform administrative actions.
Verify full access without restrictions.

title: Beneficiary Registration with Valid Data
description: Test creating a new beneficiary profile with all required valid information passed.

steps.description: Navigate to beneficiary registration page.
Fill all required fields including profile details, health info, and initial aid data.
Upload valid supporting documents.
Submit the form.
Verify beneficiary is registered and appears in the beneficiary list with correct details.
Verify that audit logs capture the registration action.

title: Beneficiary Registration Input Validation
description: Check that the registration form validates inputs and rejects invalid or missing data.

steps.description: Navigate to beneficiary registration page.
Submit the form with missing mandatory fields.
Verify that appropriate validation error messages are shown for required fields.
Enter invalid data formats (e.g., wrong date, invalid phone number).
Verify that input validation prevents submission and highlights errors.

title: Aid Request Lifecycle Workflow
description: Verify the complete lifecycle of an aid request from submission through approval, scheduling, and delivery.

steps.description: Registered beneficiary submits an aid request with required documents.
System stores request and triggers initial review status.
Operator reviews documents and marks verification status.
Verify that document status updates appropriately and is logged.
Social assessment is performed and scoring applied.
Verify scoring and recommendation reflected in aid request status.
Supervisor approves or rejects the aid request.
Verify approval status recorded and notification sent to beneficiary.
If approved, aid scheduling is created with timestamp and location logged.
Verify scheduling details are correct and visible to relevant users.
Aid is delivered and delivery confirmation is recorded.
Verify aid delivery status updated and audit logged.
Close the aid request.
Verify aid request lifecycle is complete and data export functionality includes this request.

title: Campaign Progress Tracking and Notifications
description: Verify campaign creation, progress updates, and milestone notifications via multiple channels.

steps.description: Create a new campaign with target metrics and deadlines.
Verify campaign appears in campaign list with correct initial data.
Update campaign progress incrementally.
Verify progress bar or metrics update in real-time on dashboard.
Trigger completion of a milestone.
Verify automated notifications are sent in-app, via email, and SMS as configured.

title: Financial Management Dual-Signature Approval Workflow
description: Verify that financial transactions exceeding approval thresholds require two authorized signatures.

steps.description: Initiate a financial transaction exceeding the approval limit.
Verify system blocks single approval and requests additional approval.
Obtain second signature approval from authorized user.
Verify transaction is approved and recorded only after dual signatures.
Check SMS/email confirmation notifications are sent to relevant parties.
Verify notification content correctness and delivery.

title: Document Upload with MIME Type and Virus Scanning
description: Ensure that document uploads validate MIME types and are scanned for viruses before acceptance.

steps.description: Attempt to upload a document with an allowed MIME type and safe content.
Verify document is accepted, stored, and audit logged.
Attempt to upload a document with a disallowed MIME type.
Verify system rejects the upload with an appropriate error message.
Attempt to upload a document containing a virus or malware signature.
Verify system rejects the upload and triggers security alerts.

title: Real-Time Dashboard Metrics Accuracy and Performance
description: Verify that dashboard metrics update in real-time and maintain performance under load.

steps.description: Login as user with dashboard access.
Verify initial dashboard metrics accuracy by comparing with known database values.
Simulate data changes (e.g., new aid requests, donations) in the backend.
Verify dashboard metrics update within 1 second to reflect the changes.
Load dashboards with high volume data and monitor rendering time.
Verify that page renders fully in under 3 seconds at P75 performance.

title: Notification Delivery Retry and User-Friendly Error Handling
description: Verify that notifications failing to send are retried with exponential backoff and that users receive proper error messages.

steps.description: Simulate notification channel failure (e.g., email server down).
Trigger notification delivery.
Verify system retries sending notification automatically with exponential delays.
Verify user interface shows a user-friendly error message and a retry option.
Restore notification channel and use retry button.
Verify notification is sent successfully and error message clears.

title: Data Export with Permission Enforcement and Audit Trail
description: Verify exporting sensitive data respects user permissions and logs export actions for audit.

steps.description: Login as user with permission to export beneficiary data.
Initiate export request for beneficiary profiles.
Verify data export completes successfully with masked/sanitized data according to user role.
Verify audit log records the export event with user, timestamp, and data scope.
Login as user lacking export permission.
Attempt to export beneficiary data.
Verify system denies export request with appropriate error and no data exposure.

title: Soft-Delete and Data Lifecycle Management
description: Verify that deleting data results in soft-delete with data masked and archived, preserving audit logs.

steps.description: Login as user with delete permission.
Perform delete operation on a beneficiary record.
Verify record is soft-deleted, hidden from standard lists, and sensitive data is masked.
Verify audit logs correctly capture the deletion event.
Attempt hard-delete as non-SYSADMIN role.
Verify hard-delete is disallowed with permission error.
Perform hard-delete as SYSADMIN.
Verify permanent deletion and clearance from archive.

title: Security Protections: CSRF and XSS Prevention
description: Verify CSRF tokens are enforced on forms and inputs are sanitized to prevent XSS attacks.

steps.description: Submit form requests without CSRF token.
Verify server rejects request with appropriate CSRF error.
Attempt to submit inputs containing XSS payloads in text fields.
Verify inputs are sanitized on client and server; no malicious script executes.
Confirm DOMPurify integration blocks XSS vectors.
Verify UI renders safely without script injection.

title: Mobile-First Design Responsiveness
description: Verify application UI adapts correctly on mobile devices with sticky navigation and optimized touch targets.

steps.description: Access the system on different mobile devices and resolutions.
Verify layout switches to single-column format with accessible touch targets.
Verify navigation bar sticks to the top and all buttons are easily clickable.
Perform typical user workflows (login, data entry, navigation).
Verify smooth user experience without UI overlaps or scroll issues.

title: Audit Log Completeness and Retention
description: Verify that all critical actions produce audit logs retained at least one year and viewable by authorized users.

steps.description: Perform critical actions such as user role changes, aid approvals, data exports.
Verify audit logs record user, timestamp, action type, and affected data.
Attempt to view audit logs as unauthorized user.
Ensure access is denied.
Verify audit logs retention configured for minimum one year.

title: Performance Optimization: Virtualized Lists and Request Prioritization
description: Verify that list views use virtualization to maintain fast rendering under large dataset with proper request cancellation.

steps.description: Open beneficiary list or donation records containing thousands of entries.
Verify the UI renders within 2 seconds at P75.
Scroll quickly through lists and trigger multiple filter/search requests.
Verify earlier requests are cancelled properly; only latest results displayed to user.

title: Accessibility Compliance Check
description: Verify that the interface meets accessibility standards with zero critical issues using automated and manual testing.

steps.description: Run automated accessibility scans (e.g., aXe) on key pages such as login, dashboard, beneficiary management.
Verify no critical accessibility violations are reported.
Conduct manual keyboard navigation and screen reader testing.
Verify all interactive elements are accessible and properly labeled.

title: Automated Retry for Network Failures
description: Verify that network failures trigger automatic retry with exponential backoff and user notification.

steps.description: Simulate network interruptions during API calls.
Verify the application retries network requests automatically with increasing delay.
Verify user receives a notification of failure and retry progress.
Restore network connectivity.
Verify requests succeed on retry and notifications clear.

title: End-to-End Workflow Regression
description: Execute a complete end-to-end test simulating user story scenarios covering beneficiary registration, aid lifecycle, donations, and reporting.

steps.description: Register a new beneficiary and upload required documents.
Submit an aid request and progress it through all approval stages.
Record donations and financial reconciliations related to the beneficiary.
Generate reports and export related data.
Verify all operations are successful, consistent, and reflected in audit logs.
